title: Captain for Elizabeth
description: On the trail of Spanish gold and booty, Tom Cavendish had set the Desire on a perilous course around the world -- a course that would pit his men against fierce headhunters and tropical disease, against terrifying hurricanes and the full might of Philip of Spain's navy.But it was after he captured the famous galleon Santa Anna that Cavendish met his greatest challenge -- Catherine de Montoro, whose conquest was a more exciting and compelling matter than any victory over the Spaniards.
author: Jan Westcott
